pages.title: Corn Snake
pages.text: The corn snake ($(o)Pantherophis guttatus$()) is a North American species of rat snake that subdues its small prey by constriction.$(br2)It is found throughout the southeastern and central United States.

pages.title: Corn Snake
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:rabbit$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
